message: Let's split it 90-10, a fair start to the game!
You're being too greedy, let's meet in the middle!
You're being too kind, I want more!
Meet me halfway, but with a slight bias towards me!
Time to be more aggressive, let's take the lead!
You're getting bolder, but I'm not backing down!
You're getting aggressive, so I'll be assertive!
Time to take control, I'm not backing down!
You think you're taking control, but I'm not giving up!
You're getting bold, but I'm not afraid to counter!
I'm not budging, meet me at this price or walk away!
You're not budging, but I'm not walking away yet!
You're getting desperate, let's make a deal!
Last chance, take it or leave it!
I'm not taking it, I'm walking away!
Fine, you win. Take it all.
